name: title
description: The title of your API (used in OpenAPI docs)

name: description
description: A description of your API (used in OpenAPI docs)

name: apiDir
description: The directory where your API routes are located

name: globalMiddleware
description: An array of middleware functions to apply to all routes

name: version
description: The version of your API (used in OpenAPI docs)

name: debug
description: Enable debug mode for detailed logging and interactive stack trace page
